means: （由于运动或劳累过度造成的）肌肉僵硬的，失去弹性的

sentence.Network_en: He arrived accompanied by two muscle - bound body guards.
sentence.Network_cn: 他由两名肌肉发达的保镖陪同抵达.

sentence.Network_en: I'm in tip top shape a muscle bound freak, with all the attitude I need.
sentence.Network_cn: 形态一流的我,颤动着一块块畸形的肌肉, 具备了我需要的一切姿态.

sentence.Network_en: John was big and strong, but he was muscle - bound, and I could beat him.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰人高马大,身强体壮, 但不灵活, 我可以打败他.

muscle-bound的中文意思沪江词库精选muscle-bound是什么意思、英语单词推荐、用法及解释、中英文句子翻译。muscle-bound的意思: adj. 因运动过度  muscle-bound的.

list.abs: interestingly , women do not like muscle-bound men , and men misperceive how muscular women want them to be .有趣的是，女人不喜欢肌肉男，而男人误以为女人希望他们肌肉发达。
He arrived accompanied by two muscle - bound body guards ., 他由两名肌肉发达的保镖陪同抵达.

entry.tran: 肌肉僵硬粗大的;肌肉过分发达的
entry.def: If you describe someone as muscle-bound, you mean that their muscles are well developed, usually in an unattractive way.

example.ex: ...a cartoon of a muscle-bound woman standing victorious astride a prone male.
example.tran: 一幅画着一位得意洋洋、肌肉发达的女人骑跨着一个匍匐男人的卡通画

means.word_mean: 1. having stiff muscles as the result of excessive exercise;

sentences.sentence: "he arrived accompanied by two muscle-bound body guards"
